artist: Artist: Pat Steir; Printer: Crown Point Press, San Francisco; Publisher: Crown Point Press, San Francisco
description: abstract image with grey ground with splatters and spots of white, black, brown, dark blue and light blue, with small areas of yellow, green and orange, particularly at top center
inscription: Titled at bottom center, in pencil: Wind + Water
markings:
Numbered in pencil, LLC: 6/35
Publisher\'s blindstamp:, LLC: Crown Point Press / Renee Bell / (organic symbol with \"CPP\")
medium: Color soap ground aquatint with soap ground aquatint reversal, spit-bite aquatint and drypoint
provenance: Private collection, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2011.
signed: Signed and dated, LRC, in pencil: Pat Steir 96
title: Wind and Water
